content: लाट {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>pl.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of a country and its inhabitants; एष च (लाटानुप्रासः) प्रायेण लाटजनप्रियत्वाल्लाटानुप्रासः <ls>S. D. 10.</ls> --टः {@--1@} A king of the Lāṭas. {@--2@} Old, worn out, or shabby clothes, ornaments &c. {@--3@} Clothes in general. {@--4@} Childish language. {@--5@} A learned man.
लाट <ab>N.</ab> of a country said to lie to the west of the Narmadā; it probably included Broach, Baroda and Ahmadabad, and Khaira also according to some.
